CustomField.description: The Part of my Team field identifies whether or not the record owner is a part sales hierarchy.
CustomField.formula: IF ( OR($User.Id = OwnerId, $User.Id = Owner:User.ManagerId, $User.Id = Owner:User.Manager.ManagerId,$User.Id = Owner:User.Manager.Manager.ManagerId, $User.Id = Owner:User.Manager.Manager.Manager.ManagerId ,$User.Id = Owner:User.Manager.Manager.Manager.Manager.ManagerId ,$User.Id = Owner:User.Manager.Manager.Manager.Manager.Manager.ManagerId ) , TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.label: Part of my Team
